title: Alesha Dixon glows at Simon Cowell's 60th birthday bash
text:
Alesha headed out on Monday night (Picture: Splash News)

Alesha Dixon didn’t waste any time in getting back to a bustling social life as she celebrated the 60th birthday of friend and fellow Britain’s Got Talent judge Simon Cowell, just weeks after welcoming a baby daughter.

The singer was part of a gang of stars to celebrate the Syco mogul’s milestone birthday this week, as they enjoyed a long dinner at a beachside Japanese eatery.

Please note the fact Alesha shares the same birthday as Simon (7 October) yet pushed any celebrations she might have had for her 41st to the side to make time for her mate’s soiree.

Alesha was seen leaving happy and among partygoers including Kelly Osbourne, as the birthday man took another spin around the sun.

She was positively glowing as she donned a maxi-length, black dress and tied her hair up in a high bun.

She was glowing (Picture: Splash News)

She was celebrating her own birthday as well (Picture: Splash News)

It comes after Alesha announced the exciting baby news this week, managing to keep Anaya’s birth under wraps for nearly two months.

The singer confirmed the recent rumours that she had secretly given birth by sharing a photo of her newborn baby girl with partner Azuka Ononye on Monday morning, in a nod to celebrate her own 41st birthday.

Alesha shared the news yesterday (Picture: Instagram)

There was a lot happening.

Oh, and if you were wondering, the tot’s full name is Anaya Safiya, and she was born on 20 August. Yep, a whole seven weeks ago.

Alesha’s Got Talent…at keeping things under wraps.

In the caption, Alesha said: ‘7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet.’

She was spotted arriving for filming of America’s Got Talent last Friday with her bump clearly missing, sparking rumours she had already given birth.

Anaya is Alesha’s second child with her husband Azuka, as the couple are already parents to five-year-old daughter Azura Sienna.

Alesha had announced her pregnancy during a live episode of the most recent series of BGT earlier this year, with Ant and Dec revealing her exciting news during a musical number.

As the audience cheered with congratulations, Alesha admitted she was ‘over the moon’ with the news.
